#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <sstream>

#define ULL unsigned long long
using namespace std;
char str[1000];
ULL x;
void removeX(){
     int i;
     for(i=0;i<strlen(str);i++){
                                if(str[i]<'0'|| str[i]>'9')
                                str[i]=' ';
     }
     
}
int main(){
    int t,i,n,n2,n5;
    int ans;
    
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
               scanf("%s",str);
               removeX();
               stringstream ss(str);
               ans = 1; n2  = 0; n5 = 0;
               while(ss>>x){
                
                            if(x == 0){
                              ans = 0;
                              break;
                            }
                            while(x%2 == 0){
                                      x/=2;
                                      n2++;
                            }
                            while(x%5 == 0){
                                      x/=5;
                                      n5++;
                            }
                            ans = (ans*(x%10))%10;
               }//end while
               if(ans){
                       n = n2-n5;
                       if(n>=1){
                           for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
                               ans = (ans*2)%10;
                       }else if(n<0){
                             n = 0-n;
                           for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
                               ans = (ans*5)%10;
                       }else{}
                   printf("%d\n",ans);
               }else{
                     printf("Robot hanged.\n");
               }
               
    }//end while
    return 0;
}
